group_1.textRight: You look happy, Felicia.

group_1.textLeft: Why wouldn't I be?@I got New Year’s money, New Year’s money!

group_1.textRight: It’s fun to think about what to buy,@isn’t it?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, really? I’m not puttin' too much@thought into it…
…Oh, I'll buy from there!@[chara:100552:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100552:cheek_0][chara:100552:motion_100][chara:100552:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:100552:lipSynch_1]I made up my mind!

group_1.textRight: That was fast![chara:100352:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]
Which one? That toy store?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, look! They sell lucky bags, right?
And they have tons of Decagon Ball stuff…

group_1.textRight: Oh, an action figure?

group_1.textLeft: Normally, I don’t have enough money to buy@somethin' like this.
But if I use my New Year’s money, I can@totally buy this, right?

group_1.textRight: Felicia, do you really want that action@figure?

group_1.textLeft: I promised to meet with some friends after@this.
They’ll be totally surprised when I show@them this!

group_1.textRight: Wait, wait!
Think about the promise you made to Yachiyo!
So think for a second!
You were told to buy what you really want,@didn’t you?

group_1.textLeft: But I really want that action figure!@They'll be so surprised!

group_1.textRight: Hey, Felicia.
Do you really want this action figure?
Even if you don’t like the character?
Does it really matter which character you@show your friends?

group_1.textLeft: …It doesn’t, but…they’ll be even more surprised@if I get their favorite character.

group_1.textRight: Then how about taking a little more time to@think about it? Otherwise, you might regret it.
You sure?
That store also sells Decagon Ball@merchandise, right?
Then let's take a look over there too,@okay?

group_1.textLeft: I don’t mind, but...@What if the bags here sell out?

group_1.textRight: They have lots of them,@so it’ll be ok!

group_1.textLeft: Then, let's go to the other store!

group_1.textRight: So they're selling Dragon Ball lucky@bags here too, huh?
Looks like these bags have…
Those ones are smaller than the others.

group_1.textLeft: But these are super rare! And this store@has only three of them!

group_1.textRight: Do you want to buy your bag here, then?
The action figure?
Yeah...
[chara:302801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Felicia?!@What are you doin' here?!

group_1.textLeft: I should ask you the same thing!@It’s still too early to meet up.

group_1.textRight: I know that!
Huh...?@Felicia...
The friend you were going to meet after@this was Ayame?
